name: Rats! (itch)
description:
Ever want to be a rat in a maze searching for cheese? Well this is your lucky day! Rats! is a game about being a rat in a maze looking for cheese. It was made for the Linux Game Jam in March 2017. (https://itch.io/jam/linux-jam-2017)

Instructions

Use arrow keys to play.

There are three types of cheese.

  1. Normal - adds 10 seconds to your time
  2. Speed - doubles your rats' speed for a short time
  3. Bomb - blows up the rat and ends the level in 10 seconds if rat doesn't eat a normal piece of cheese in time!
